extends Model

Model implementation for performing Grammatical Evolution.

Constructor Detail

GEModel

public GEModel()
Construct a GEModel with a set of sensible defaults. See the appropriate accessor method for information of each default value.

Method Detail

run

public void run()
Executes this model to perform a series of evolutionary runs.

Calling this method directly will run this model sequentially, or it can be passed into a new thread object whose start() method is then called to run this model in a new thread. A checks is performed after running the configure event that the model is in a runnable state. A model is in a runnable state if all compulsory control parameters and operators have been set. If it is not in a runnable state then an IllegalStateException is thrown.

Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable
Overrides:
run in class Model

getGrammar

public Grammar getGrammar()
Returns the grammar instance that determines the structure of the programs to be evolved. As well as defining the syntax of solutions, the grammar also essentially determines the function and terminal sets which are features of tree GP.

Returns:
the language grammar that defines the syntax of solutions.

setGrammar

public void setGrammar(Grammar grammar)
Sets the grammar that defines the valid syntax of the programs to be evolves.

Parameters:
grammar - the language grammar to use to define the syntax of solutions.

getMapper

public Mapper getMapper()
Returns the mapper which should be used to perform the mapping from a chromosome (List of Codons) to a source string with a syntax matching the grammar.

Defaults to an instance of DepthFirstMapper.

Returns:
a Mapper to be used to map from chromosome to source.

setMapper

public void setMapper(Mapper mapper)
Overwrites the default mapper used to map chromosomes to source strings.

Parameters:
mapper - the mapper to be used during the mapping operation.

getCodonGenerator

public CodonGenerator getCodonGenerator()
Returns the CodonGenerator that the system should use for generating any new Codons.

Defaults to an instance of StandardGenerator.

Returns:
the CodonGenerator to use for generating new codons.

setCodonGenerator

public void setCodonGenerator(CodonGenerator codonGenerator)
Overwrites the default codon generator used to generate new codons throughout the run.

Parameters:
codonGenerator - the codon generator to be used any time a new codon is required.

getMaxCodonSize

public int getMaxCodonSize()
Returns the maximum value of a codon. Codon values are positive integers from zero to this size.

Defaults to Integer.MAX_VALUE.

Returns:
the maximum value of a codon.

setMaxCodonSize

public void setMaxCodonSize(int maxCodonSize)
Overwrites the default maximum size of each codon.

Parameters:
maxCodonSize - the maximum size of a codon to replace the current maximum with. Must be a positive integer.

getMaxChromosomeLength

public int getMaxChromosomeLength()
Returns the maximum number of codons that should be allowed in a chromosome. Crossovers or mutations that result in a larger chromosome size will not be allowed.

Defaults to 100.

Returns:
the maximum number of codons to be allowed in a chromosome.

setMaxChromosomeLength

public void setMaxChromosomeLength(int maxChromosomeLength)
Overwrites the default maximum number of codons in a program's chromosome.

Parameters:
maxChromosomeLength - the maximum number of codons to allow in a chromosome.

getMaxDepth

public int getMaxDepth()
Returns the maximum depth of the derivation trees allowed. Crossovers or mutations that result in a larger chromosome will not be allowed.

Defaults to 14.

Returns:
the maximum depth of derivation trees to allow.

setMaxDepth

public void setMaxDepth(int maxDepth)
Overwrites the default maximum allowable depth of a program's derivation tree.

Max depth of -1 is allowed to indicate no limit.

Parameters:
maxDepth - the maximum depth to allow a program's derivation tree.

getMaxInitialDepth

public int getMaxInitialDepth()
Returns the maximum depth of the derivation trees allowed at initialisation.

Defaults to 8.

Returns:
the maximum depth of derivation trees to allow after initialisation.

setMaxInitialDepth

public void setMaxInitialDepth(int maxInitialDepth)
Overwrites the default maximum allowable depth of a program's derivation tree after initialisation. Max depth of -1 is allowed to indicate no limit.

Parameters:
maxDepth - the maximum depth to allow a program's derivation tree after initialisation.

cacheSource

public boolean cacheSource()
Whether CandidatePrograms should cache their source code after mapping to reduce the need for mapping when the codons are unchanged. Caching the source potentially gives a large performance improvement and is generally desirable but if the grammar might change during a run then caching shouldn't be used as the same codons will evaluate to a different source.

Defaults to true.

Returns:
true if the source should be cached after mapping and false otherwise.

setCacheSource

public void setCacheSource(boolean cacheSource)
Overwrites the default setting of whether to cache the source code after mapping, until the chromosome is changed again.

Parameters:
cacheSource - true if the source should be cached, false otherwise.
